title: Eliminate a Variable
text: The equations are already in standard form. The coefficients of $$y$$ are already opposite.

title: Solve for $$x$$
text: $$y$$ will be eliminated and then solve for $$x$$.\n$$2x=-14$$\n$$x=-7$$

title: Substitute and Solve for $$y$$
text:
Substitute $$x=-7$$ into one of the original equations and solve for $$y$$.
$$x+y=-8$$
$$\left(-7ight)+y=-8$$
$$y=-1$$

title: Solution as Ordered Pair
text: Solution to the system of equations is $$(-7,-1)$$.
